language_mode.label: Language
language_mode.info: Choose the output language for the JSON-LD. “Auto” follows the visitor/store locale.

org_logo.label: Organization logo
org_logo.info: High-quality logo used as Organization image in rich results.

org_phone.label: Support phone
org_phone.info: Public customer support phone number (E.164 or local format).

org_email.label: Support email
org_email.info: Public customer support email (used for Organization and ContactPage).

org_sameas.label: Social profiles (one per line)
org_sameas.info: Paste full URLs (e.g. https://www.instagram.com/yourbrand). One per line.

address_street.label: Street and number
address_street.info: Your business address street (optional but recommended).

address_city.label: City
address_city.info: City or locality of your business address.

address_postal.label: Postal code
address_postal.info: ZIP/Postal code of your business address.

address_country.label: Country (ISO-2, e.g. ES or PT)
address_country.info: Two-letter country code for your business address (e.g. ES, PT).

returns_days.label: Return window (days)
returns_days.info: Number of days for returns in your MerchantReturnPolicy.

free_returns.label: Free returns
free_returns.info: If enabled, sets returnFees to FreeReturn; otherwise ReturnShippingFees.

website_on_home_only.label: Emit WebSite only on home
website_on_home_only.info: Enable to output WebSite JSON-LD only on the homepage.

force_availability.label: Force availability (debug)
force_availability.info: Override stock availability for Product (e.g. InStock, OutOfStock). Leave blank to use real stock.

shipping_countries.label: Shipping countries (ISO-2 list)
shipping_countries.info: Comma-separated ISO-2 country codes for shipping (e.g. ES,PT,FR).

include_shipping_rate.label: Include shipping rate amount
include_shipping_rate.info: If enabled, adds shippingRate MonetaryAmount to the Offer/ShippingDetails.

shipping_rate_value.label: Shipping rate amount
shipping_rate_value.info: Numeric value for shippingRate (currency will use your cart currency).

emit_collection_auto.label: Emit Collection/FAQ on collection pages
emit_collection_auto.info: Outputs WebPage/CollectionPage and optional FAQPage if the metafield is present.

faq_handle.label: FAQ metafield handle (namespace.key)
faq_handle.info: Single handle such as custom.faq. Create a Collection metafield: either (1) Rich text with pairs of question (short line ending with '?') followed by answer paragraph; or (2) Metaobjects list with fields Question/Answer (or Pregunta/Respuesta). The app will auto-detect and emit a valid FAQPage if it finds ≥2 Q&A pairs.

emit_howto_auto.label: Emit HowTo on articles
emit_howto_auto.info: Automatically builds a HowTo from H2 sections (if 2+ steps are found).

suppress_theme_jsonld.label: Remove theme JSON-LD (beta)
suppress_theme_jsonld.info: Removes non-app JSON-LD scripts (Product, Organization, WebSite, BreadcrumbList, FAQPage, BlogPosting/Article, AboutPage, ContactPage) injected by the theme to avoid duplicates. Use with caution and test thoroughly.
